name: SplitSoul
description:
*Slight seizure warning*

A short top-down puzzle story game, with some basis on a real-life story, following the events of our 2 characters, that apparently share the same soul.

Explore the game, by discovering items, hints, and dialogue, to progress in the story and learn what is the fate of our distressed characters.

Features
  • Multiple rooms to explore
  • Dialogue System with custom-made dialogue
  • Vehicle minigame 
  • Different items and hints to collect
  • Objectives to follow
Controls
  • WASD to move the character
  • AD to move the car horizontally
  • E to interact with objects
  • I to open Inventory
  • O to open Objectives

This was a short game made for the Black & White Jam #9 with the theme: Death is a new beginning.

Slight seizure warning.
